entry.title: Vorlage: Gelati Sugarfree B DEV
entry.content:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" ?> <!DOCTYPE html> <html b:css='false' b:version='2' class='v2' expr:dir='data:blog.languageDirection' expr:lang='data:blog.locale' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml' xmlns:b='http://www.google.com/2005/gml/b' xmlns:data='http://www.google.com/2005/gml/data' xmlns:expr='http://www.google.com/2005/gml/expr'>
<b:comment> configure blogtemplate - custom domain (optional) </b:comment> <b:with value='data:view.isPreview or not data:blog.hasCustomDomain ? { menu: "2c6b88", slider: "b2l868", tooltip: "248t8" } : { menu: "2c1s75", slider: "b2u517", tooltip: "24735" }' var='licenseKeys'> <b:comment render='false'> configure blogtemplate - custom domain (optional) </b:comment> <b:comment> <!-- <b:with value='data:view.isPreview or not data:blog.hasCustomDomain ? { menu: "2c6b88", slider: "b2l868", tooltip: "248t8" } : { menu: "2c4g83", slider: "b2l348", tooltip: "248h3" }' var='licenseKeys'> --> </b:comment> <b:comment> configure blogtemplate - hosting/development (optional) </b:comment> <b:with value='data:view.isPreview or not data:blog.hasCustomDomain ? "//gelatistatic-dev.sugar3.io" : "//gelatistatic-dev.sugar3.io"' var='resourcesUrl'> <b:with value='"v1"' var='resourcesVersion'> <b:comment> <!-- <b:with value='data:view.isPreview or not data:blog.hasCustomDomain ? "//gelatistatic-dev.sugar3.io" : "//static-dev.glitch.at"' var='resourcesUrl'> --> <!-- <b:with value='"v1_dev"' var='resourcesVersion'> --> </b:comment> <b:comment> configure blogtemplate - blog settings (optional) </b:comment> <b:with value='{ url: "https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-94GT-dZX98s/X0ZymIlygGI/AAAAAAAAW78/CAk1lkbxRnoJCHb0np0YOJKhzGPq-TJ2ACLcBGAsYHQ", name: "icon.png", width: 256, height: 256 }' var='snippetCover'> <b:comment> alternate blog logo for snippet scrapers <!-- <b:with value='{ url: "", name: "", width: 0, height: 0 }' var='snippetCover'> --> </b:comment>
<head>
<script type='text/javascript'> var blogTemplate = {}; blogTemplate.licenseKeys = JSON.parse('{"licenseKeys": { "menu": "<data:licenseKeys.menu/>", "slider": "<data:licenseKeys.slider/>", "tooltip": "<data:licenseKeys.tooltip/>" }}').licenseKeys; blogTemplate.resourcesUrl = <b:eval expr='"'" + data:resourcesUrl + "'"'/>; blogTemplate.resourcesVersion = <b:eval expr='"'" + data:resourcesVersion + "'"'/>; </script>
<meta content='width=device-width,initial-scale=1.0,minimum-scale=1.0,maximum-scale=1.0' name='viewport'/>
<b:include data='blog' name='all-head-content'/> <title><data:blog.pageTitle/></title>
<b:skin><![CDATA[ /* ----------------------------------------------- Blogger Template Style Name: Gelati Sugarfree Designer: Christian Sam URL: gelati.sugar3.io ----------------------------------------------- */
/* Variable definitions ==================== <Variable name="keycolor" description="Main Color" type="color" default="#b3ca88" value="#b3ca88"/>
<Group description="Page" selector="body, #Attribution1 .widget-content"> <Variable name="body.font" description="Font" type="font" default="normal normal 16px Arial, Tahoma, Helvetica, FreeSans, sans-serif" value="normal normal 16px Montserrat"/> <Variable name="body.text.color" description="Text Color" type="color" default="#000000" value="#000000"/> <Variable name="body.background.color" description="Background Color" type="color" default="#ffffff" value="#ffffff"/>
<Variable name="body.font.desktop" description="Font Size Desktop" type="font" size="16px" family="Montserrat" default="normal normal $(size) $(family)" value="normal normal $(size) $(family)"/> <Variable name="body.font.mobile" description="Font Size Mobile" type="font" size="18px" family="Montserrat" default="normal normal $(size) $(family)" value="normal normal $(size) $(family)"/> </Group>
<Group description="Links" selector="#Attribution1 .widget-content a"> <Variable name="link.color" description="Link Color" type="color" default="#d52a33" value="#d52a33"/> <Variable hideEditor='true' name="link.visited.color" description="Visited Color" type="color" default="#8e7cc3" value="#8e7cc3"/> <Variable hideEditor='true' name="link.hover.color" description="Hover Color" type="color" default="#8e7cc3" value="#8e7cc3"/> </Group>
<Group description="Cover" selector=".teaser-header:not([class~='none-cover']), .cover-item:not([class~='none-cover'])"> <Variable hideEditor='true' name="cover.font" description="Font" type="font" default="normal bold 24px Arial, Tahoma, Helvetica, FreeSans, sans-serif" value="normal normal 24px Montserrat"/> <Variable hideEditor='true' name="cover.text.color" description="Text Color" type="color" default="#ffffff" value="#ffffff"/> <Variable name="cover.background.color" description="Background Color" type="color" default="#2ab8ab" value="#2ab8ab"/> </Group>
<Group description="Cover2" selector=".teaser-header.none-cover"> <Variable hideEditor='true' name="cover2.font" description="Font" type="font" default="normal bold 24px Arial, Tahoma, Helvetica, FreeSans, sans-serif" value="normal normal 24px Montserrat"/> <Variable hideEditor='true' name="cover2.text.color" description="Text Color" type="color" default="#ffffff" value="#ffffff"/> <Variable name="cover2.background.color" description="Background Color" type="color" default="#2ab8ab" value="#2ab8ab"/> </Group>
<Group description="Button" selector="button.button-item, #Blog1 .button-item, #blog-panel .button-item"> <Variable hideEditor="true" name="button.font" description="Font" type="font" default="normal bold 24px Arial, Tahoma, Helvetica, FreeSans, sans-serif" value="normal normal 24px Montserrat"/> <Variable name="button.text.color" description="Text Color" type="color" default="#ffffff" value="#ffffff"/> <Variable name="button.background.color" description="Background Color" type="color" default="#d52a33" value="#d52a33"/> </Group>
<Group description="Disabled" selector=".disabled-item"> <Variable hideEditor="true" name="disabled.font" description="Font" type="font" default="normal bold 24px Arial, Tahoma, Helvetica, FreeSans, sans-serif" value="normal normal 24px Montserrat"/> <Variable name="disabled.text.color" description="Text Color" type="color" default="#bbbbbb" value="#bbbbbb"/> <Variable name="disabled.background.color" description="Background Color" type="color" default="#bbbbbb" value="#bbbbbb"/> </Group>
<Group description="Caption" selector=".caption-item"> <Variable name="caption.font" description="Font" type="font" default="normal bold 14px Arial, Tahoma, Helvetica, FreeSans, sans-serif" value="normal bold 24px Montserrat"/> <Variable hideEditor="true" name="caption.text.color" description="Text Color" type="color" default="#0000ff" value="#0000ff"/> <Variable hideEditor='true' name="caption.background.color" description="Background Color" type="color" default="#1b1d1e" value="#1b1d1e"/> </Group>
<Group description="Widget Head" selector=".widget-title"> <Variable name="widget.font" description="Font" type="font" default="normal normal 24px Arial, Tahoma, Helvetica, FreeSans, sans-serif" value="normal normal 24px Montserrat"/> <Variable name="widget.text.color" description="Text Color" type="color" default="#000000" value="#000000"/> <Variable hideEditor='true' name="widget.background.color" description="Background Color" type="color" default="#ABCDEF" value="#ABCDEF"/> </Group>
<Group description="Section Head" selector=".header-item"> <Variable name="section.head.font" description="Font" type="font" default="normal normal 24px Arial, Tahoma, Helvetica, FreeSans, sans-serif" value="normal normal 24px Montserrat"/> <Variable hideEditor='true' name="section.head.text.color" description="Text Color" type="color" default="#333333" value="#333333"/> <Variable hideEditor='true' name="section.head.background.color" description="Background Color" type="color" default="#ABCDEF" value="#ABCDEF"/> </Group>
<Group description="Section Body" selector=".body-item"> <Variable name="section.body.font" description="Font" type="font" default="normal normal 24px Arial, Tahoma, Helvetica, FreeSans, sans-serif" value="normal normal 24px Montserrat"/> <Variable hideEditor='true' name="section.body.text.color" description="Text Color" type="color" default="#333333" value="#333333"/> <Variable hideEditor='true' name="section.body.background.color" description="Background Color" type="color" default="#ABCDEF" value="#ABCDEF"/> </Group>
<Group description="Card Title" selector=".teaser-body > .title-item"> <Variable name="title.font" description="Font" type="font" default="normal bold 24px Arial, Tahoma, Helvetica, FreeSans, sans-serif" value="normal normal 24px Montserrat"/> <Variable name="title.text.color" description="Text Color" type="color" default="#000000" value="#000000"/> <Variable hideEditor="true" name="title.background.color" description="Background Color" type="color" default="#1b1d1e" value="#1b1d1e"/> </Group>
<Group description="Card Content" selector=".teaser-body > .content-item"> <Variable name="content.font" description="Font" type="font" default="normal bold 24px Arial, Tahoma, Helvetica, FreeSans, sans-serif" value="normal normal 24px Montserrat"/> <Variable name="content.text.color" description="Text Color" type="color" default="#000000" value="#000000"/> <Variable hideEditor="true" name="content.background.color" description="Background Color" type="color" default="#1b1d1e" value="#1b1d1e"/> </Group>
<Group description="Card Meta" selector=".hero-item-list .meta-item, .widget-item-list .meta-item"> <Variable name="meta.font" description="Font" type="font" default="normal bold 24px Arial, Tahoma, Helvetica, FreeSans, sans-serif" value="normal normal 24px Montserrat"/> <Variable name="meta.text.color" description="Text Color" type="color" default="#000000" value="#000000"/> <Variable hideEditor="true" name="meta.background.color" description="Background Color" type="color" default="#1b1d1e" value="#1b1d1e"/> </Group>
<Group description="Card Label" selector=".hero-item-list .label-item, .widget-item-list .label-item, .teaser-footer .label-item"> <Variable name="label.font" description="Font" type="font" default="normal bold 24px Arial, Tahoma, Helvetica, FreeSans, sans-serif" value="normal normal 24px Montserrat"/> <Variable name="label.text.color" description="Text Color" type="color" default="#ffffff" value="#ffffff"/> <Variable name="label.background.color" description="Background Color" type="color" default="#000000" value="#000000"/> </Group>
<Group description="Card Counter" selector=".counter-item"> <Variable name="counter.font" description="Font" type="font" default="normal bold 24px Arial, Tahoma, Helvetica, FreeSans, sans-serif" value="normal normal 24px Montserrat"/> <Variable name="counter.text.color" description="Text Color" type="color" default="#ffffff" value="#ffffff"/> <Variable name="counter.background.color" description="Background Color" type="color" default="#d52a33" value="#d52a33"/> </Group>
<Group description="Header" selector=".header-outer"> <Variable hideEditor='true' name="header.font" description="Font" type="font" default="normal normal 24px Arial, Tahoma, Helvetica, FreeSans, sans-serif" value="normal normal 24px Montserrat"/> <Variable hideEditor='true' name="header.text.color" description="Text Color" type="color" default="#ff00ff" value="#ff00ff"/> <Variable name="header.background.color" description="Background Color" type="color" default="#efcdaa" value="#efcdaa"/> </Group>
<Group description="Header Widget" selector=".header-outer .widget-item-outer"> <Variable hideEditor='true' name="header.widget.font" description="Font" type="font" default="normal normal 24px Arial, Tahoma, Helvetica, FreeSans, sans-serif" value="normal normal 24px Montserrat"/> <Variable hideEditor='true' name="header.widget.text.color" description="Text Color" type="color" default="transparent" value="transparent"/> <Variable name="header.widget.background.color" description="Background Color" type="color" default="transparent" value="transparent"/> </Group>
<Group description="Header Section" selector="#Label1 .label-item, #Label1 #more-open"> <Variable name="header.section.font" description="Font" type="font" default="normal normal 24px Arial, Tahoma, Helvetica, FreeSans, sans-serif" value="normal normal 24px Montserrat"/> <Variable name="header.section.text.color" description="Text Color" type="color" default="#000000" value="#000000"/> <Variable hideEditor='true' name="header.section.background.color" description="Background Color" type="color" default="#ffff00" value="#ffff00"/> </Group>
<Group description="Header Selected" selector="#Label1 .selected-item a"> <Variable hideEditor='true' name="header.selected.font" description="Font" type="font" default="normal bold 24px Arial, Tahoma, Helvetica, FreeSans, sans-serif" value="normal normal 24px Montserrat"/> <Variable name="header.selected.text.color" description="Text Color" type="color" default="#ffffff" value="#ffffff"/> <Variable name="header.selected.background.color" description="Background Color" type="color" default="#0000ff" value="#0000ff"/> </Group>
<Group description="Header Logo" selector="#Header1 .logo-title"> <Variable name="header.logo.font" description="Font" type="font" default="normal normal 24px Arial, Tahoma, Helvetica, FreeSans, sans-serif" value="normal normal 24px Montserrat"/> <Variable name="header.logo.text.color" description="Text Color" type="color" default="#000000" value="#000000"/> <Variable hideEditor='true' name="header.logo.background.color" description="Background Color" type="color" default="#ffff00" value="#ffff00"/> </Group>
<Group description="Header Logo2" selector="#Header1 .logo-content"> <Variable name="header2.logo.font" description="Font" type="font" default="normal normal 24px Arial, Tahoma, Helvetica, FreeSans, sans-serif" value="normal normal 24px Montserrat"/> <Variable name="header2.logo.text.color" description="Text Color" type="color" default="#000000" value="#000000"/> <Variable hideEditor='true' name="header2.logo.background.color" description="Background Color" type="color" default="#ffff00" value="#ffff00"/> </Group>
<Group description="Hero" selector=".tabs-outer"> <Variable hideEditor='true' name="hero.font" description="Font" type="font" default="normal bold 24px Arial, Tahoma, Helvetica, FreeSans, sans-serif" value="normal normal 24px Montserrat"/> <Variable hideEditor='true' name="hero.text.color" description="Text Color" type="color" default="#ffffff" value="#ffffff"/> <Variable name="hero.background.color1" description="Background Color1" type="color" default="#2ab8ab" value="#2ab8ab"/> <Variable name="hero.background.color2" description="Background Color2" type="color" default="#efcdaa" value="#efcdaa"/> <Variable name="hero.background.angle1" description="Background Angle1" type="string" default="0deg" value="0deg"/> </Group>
<Group description="Hero Widget" selector=".tabs-outer .hero-item-list.widget-item-outer"> <Variable hideEditor='true' name="hero.widget.font" description="Font" type="font" default="normal bold 24px Arial, Tahoma, Helvetica, FreeSans, sans-serif" value="normal normal 24px Montserrat"/> <Variable hideEditor='true' name="hero.widget.text.color" description="Text Color" type="color" default="#ffffff" value="#ffffff"/> <Variable name="hero.widget.background.color" description="Background Color" type="color" default="rgba(0, 0, 0, 0)" value="rgba(0, 0, 0, 0)"/> </Group>
<Group description="Hero Card" selector="#blog-hero .hero-item-slider .teaser-title, #blog-hero .hero-item-list .teaser-item"> <Variable hideEditor='true' name="hero.card.font" description="Font" type="font" default="normal bold 24px Arial, Tahoma, Helvetica, FreeSans, sans-serif" value="normal normal 24px Montserrat"/> <Variable hideEditor='true' name="hero.card.text.color" description="Text Color" type="color" default="#333333" value="#333333"/> <Variable name="hero.card.background.color1" description="Background Color1" type="color" default="#eeeeee" value="#eeeeee"/> <Variable name="hero.card.background.color2" description="Background Color2" type="color" default="#efcdaa" value="#efcdaa"/> <Variable name="hero.card.background.angle1" description="Background Angle1" type="string" default="90deg" value="90deg"/> </Group>
<Group description="Hero Title" selector="#blog-hero .teaser-title"> <Variable name="hero.title.font" description="Font" type="font" default="normal bold 24px Arial, Tahoma, Helvetica, FreeSans, sans-serif" value="normal normal 24px Montserrat"/> <Variable name="hero.title.text.color" description="Text Color" type="color" default="#000000" value="#000000"/> <Variable hideEditor='true' name="hero.title.background.color" description="Background Color" type="color" default="#f4cccc" value="#f4cccc"/> </Group>
<Group description="Hero Meta" selector="#blog-hero .teaser-meta"> <Variable name="hero.meta.font" description="Font" type="font" default="normal bold 14px Arial, Tahoma, Helvetica, FreeSans, sans-serif" value="normal normal 14px Montserrat"/> <Variable name="hero.meta.text.color" description="Text Color" type="color" default="#efcdaa" value="#efcdaa"/> <Variable hideEditor='true' name="hero.meta.background.color" description="Background Color" type="color" default="#f4cccc" value="#f4cccc"/> </Group>
<Group description="Blog" selector=".main-outer"> <Variable hideEditor='true' name="blog.font" description="Font" type="font" default="normal bold 24px Arial, Tahoma, Helvetica, FreeSans, sans-serif" value="normal normal 24px Montserrat"/> <Variable hideEditor='true' name="blog.text.color" description="Text Color" type="color" default="#ffffff" value="#ffffff"/> <Variable name="blog.background.color" description="Background Color" type="color" default="#2ab8ab" value="#2ab8ab"/> </Group>
<Group description="Blog Widget" selector=".main-outer .widget-item-outer, .main-outer .blog-item-outer"> <Variable hideEditor='true' name="blog.widget.font" description="Font" type="font" default="normal bold 24px Arial, Tahoma, Helvetica, FreeSans, sans-serif" value="normal normal 24px Montserrat"/> <Variable hideEditor='true' name="blog.widget.text.color" description="Text Color" type="color" default="#ffffff" value="#ffffff"/> <Variable name="blog.widget.background.color" description="Background Color" type="color" default="rgba(0, 0, 0, 0)" value="rgba(0, 0, 0, 0)"/> </Group>
<Group description="Blog Section" selector="#Blog1 .main-item"> <Variable name="blog.section.font" description="Font" type="font" default="normal normal 14px Arial, Tahoma, Helvetica, FreeSans, sans-serif" value="normal normal 14px Montserrat"/> <Variable name="blog.section.text.color" description="Text Color" type="color" default="#000000" value="#000000"/> <Variable name="blog.section.background.color" description="Background Color" type="color" default="#eeeeee" value="#eeeeee"/> </Group>
<Group description="Blog Section2" selector=".main-outer .widget-item-inner"> <Variable hideEditor='true' name="blog2.widget.font" description="Font" type="font" default="normal normal 24px Arial, Tahoma, Helvetica, FreeSans, sans-serif" value="normal normal 24px Montserrat"/> <Variable hideEditor='true' name="blog2.widget.text.color" description="Text Color" type="color" default="#333333" value="#333333"/> <Variable name="blog2.widget.background.color" description="Background Color" type="color" default="#666666" value="#666666"/> </Group>
<Group description="Blog Card" selector=".main-outer .teaser-item"> <Variable hideEditor='true' name="blog.card.font" description="Font" type="font" default="normal bold 24px Arial, Tahoma, Helvetica, FreeSans, sans-serif" value="normal normal 24px Montserrat"/> <Variable hideEditor='true' name="blog.card.text.color" description="Text Color" type="color" default="#333333" value="#333333"/> <Variable name="blog.card.background.color" description="Background Color" type="color" default="#efcdaa" value="#efcdaa"/> </Group>
<Group description="Blog Title" selector="#Blog1 .post-header"> <Variable name="blog.title.font" description="Font" type="font" default="normal bold 24px Arial, Tahoma, Helvetica, FreeSans, sans-serif" value="normal normal 24px Montserrat"/> <Variable name="blog.title.text.color" description="Text Color" type="color" default="#000000" value="#000000"/> <Variable hideEditor='true' name="blog.title.background.color" description="Background Color" type="color" default="#CCBBAA" value="#CCBBAA"/> </Group>
<Group description="Blog Meta" selector="#Blog1 .date-header"> <Variable name="blog.meta.font" description="Font" type="font" default="normal normal 24px Arial, Tahoma, Helvetica, FreeSans, sans-serif" value="normal normal 24px Montserrat"/> <Variable name="blog.meta.text.color" description="Text Color" type="color" default="#000000" value="#000000"/> <Variable hideEditor='true' name="blog.meta.background.color" description="Background Color" type="color" default="#00ffff" value="#00ffff"/> </Group>
<Group description="Blogpost Cite" selector=""> <Variable name="blogpost.cite.font" description="Font" type="font" default="normal bold 14px Arial, Tahoma, Helvetica, FreeSans, sans-serif" value="italic normal 24px Cuprum"/> <Variable hideEditor="true" name="blogpost.cite.text.color" description="Text Color" type="color" default="#6e00ff" value="#6e00ff"/> <Variable hideEditor='true' name="blogpost.cite.background.color" description="Background Color" type="color" default="#1b1d1e" value="#1b1d1e"/> </Group>
<Group description="Blogpost Footer" selector=""> <Variable name="blogpost.footer.font" description="Font" type="font" default="normal bold 14px Arial, Tahoma, Helvetica, FreeSans, sans-serif" value="normal normal 24px Cuprum"/> <Variable hideEditor="true" name="blogpost.footer.text.color" description="Text Color" type="color" default="#6e00ff" value="#6e00ff"/> <Variable hideEditor='true' name="blogpost.footer.background.color" description="Background Color" type="color" default="#1b1d1e" value="#1b1d1e"/> </Group>
<Group description="Pager" selector="#blog-panel"> <Variable hideEditor='true' name="pager.font" description="Font" type="font" default="normal normal 24px Arial, Tahoma, Helvetica, FreeSans, sans-serif" value="normal normal 24px Montserrat"/> <Variable hideEditor='true' name="pager.text.color" description="Text Color" type="color" default="#ff00ff" value="#ff00ff"/> <Variable name="pager.background.color" description="Background Color" type="color" default="#2ab8ab" value="#2ab8ab"/> </Group>
<Group description="Pager Widget" selector="#blog-panel .nav-item"> <Variable hideEditor='true' name="pager.widget.font" description="Font" type="font" default="normal normal 24px Arial, Tahoma, Helvetica, FreeSans, sans-serif" value="normal normal 24px Montserrat"/> <Variable hideEditor='true' name="pager.widget.text.color" description="Text Color" type="color" default="#ff00ff" value="#ff00ff"/> <Variable name="pager.widget.background.color" description="Background Color" type="color" default="rgba(0, 0, 0, 0)" value="rgba(0, 0, 0, 0)"/> </Group>
<Group description="Pager Section" selector="#blog-pager .pager-item-number"> <Variable name="pager.section.number.font" description="Font" type="font" default="normal normal 24px Arial, Tahoma, Helvetica, FreeSans, sans-serif" value="normal normal 24px Montserrat"/> <Variable name="pager.section.number.text.color" description="Text Color" type="color" default="#000000" value="#000000"/> <Variable name="pager.section.number.background.color" description="Background Color" type="color" default="#ffffff" value="#ffffff"/> </Group>
<Group description="Pager Section2" selector="#blog-pager .pager-item-alpha"> <Variable hideEditor='true' name="pager.section.alpha.font" description="Font" type="font" default="normal normal 24px Arial, Tahoma, Helvetica, FreeSans, sans-serif" value="normal normal 24px Montserrat"/> <Variable name="pager.section.alpha.text.color" description="Text Color" type="color" default="#ffffff" value="#ffffff"/> <Variable name="pager.section.alpha.background.color" description="Background Color" type="color" default="#d52a33" value="#d52a33"/> </Group>
<Group description="Pager Selected" selector="#blog-pager .selected-item"> <Variable hideEditor='true' name="pager.selected.font" description="Selected Font" type="font" default="normal bold 24px Arial, Tahoma, Helvetica, FreeSans, sans-serif" value="normal normal 24px Montserrat"/> <Variable name="pager.selected.text.color" description="Selected Color" type="color" default="#ffffff" value="#ffffff"/> <Variable name="pager.selected.background.color" description="Selected Background" type="color" default="#0000ff" value="#0000ff"/> </Group>
<Group description="Footer" selector=".footer-outer"> <Variable hideEditor='true' name="footer.font" description="Font" type="font" default="normal normal 24px Arial, Tahoma, Helvetica, FreeSans, sans-serif" value="normal normal 24px Montserrat"/> <Variable hideEditor='true' name="footer.text.color" description="Text Color" type="color" default="#333333" value="#333333"/> <Variable name="footer.background.color" description="Background Color" type="color" default="#efcdaa" value="#efcdaa"/> </Group>
<Group description="Footer Widget" selector=".footer-inner .widget"> <Variable hideEditor='true' name="footer.widget.font" description="Font" type="font" default="normal normal 14px Arial, Tahoma, Helvetica, FreeSans, sans-serif" value="normal normal 24px Montserrat"/> <Variable hideEditor='true' name="footer.widget.text.color" description="Text Color" type="color" default="#333333" value="#333333"/> <Variable name="footer.widget.background.color" description="Background Color" type="color" default="rgba(0, 0, 0, 0)" value="rgba(0, 0, 0, 0)"/> </Group>
<Group description="Footer Section" selector=".footer-inner .widget"> <Variable name="footer.section.font" description="Font" type="font" default="normal normal 24px Arial, Tahoma, Helvetica, FreeSans, sans-serif" value="normal normal 24px Montserrat"/> <Variable name="footer.section.text.color" description="Text Color" type="color" default="#000000" value="#000000"/> <Variable name="footer.section.background.color" description="Background Color" type="color" default="rgba(0, 0, 0, 0)" value="rgba(0, 0, 0, 0)"/> </Group>
<Group description="Light Color" selector="#Blog1 .post-body .cover-item.small-cover ~ .content-item, #Blog1 .widget-item-outer .widget-item-slider.has-left::before, #Blog1 .widget-item-outer .widget-item-slider.has-right::after"> <Variable name="light.text.color" description="Text Color" type="color" default="#ffffff" value="#ffffff"/> <Variable name="light.background.color" description="Background Color" type="color" default="#ffffff" value="#ffffff"/> </Group>
<Group description="Dark Color" selector=""> <Variable name="dark.text.color" description="Text Color" type="color" default="#000000" value="#000000"/> <Variable name="dark.background.color" description="Background Color" type="color" default="#000000" value="#000000"/> </Group>
<Group description="Complementary Color" selector=""> <Variable name="complementary.text.color" description="Text Color" type="color" default="#7f5959" value="#7f5959"/> <Variable name="complementary.background.color" description="Background Color" type="color" default="#d1ff00" value="#d1ff00"/> </Group>
<!-- b:comment: overlay solid --> <Group description="Overlay Solid" selector="#blog-hero .hero-item-slider .teaser-body, #Blog1 .post-body .cover-item.small-cover ~ .content-item"> <Variable name="shade.solid.background.color" description="Shade Solid Background Color" type="color" default="rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5)" value="rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5)"/> </Group> <Group description="Overlay Solid2" selector="#Blog1 .post-footer .mcmenu .clm"> <Variable name="shade2.solid.background.color" description="Shade2 Solid Background Color" type="color" default="rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.15)" value="rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.15)"/> </Group>
<!-- b:comment: overlay monochrome --> <Group description="Overlay Monochrome" selector=""> <Variable hideEditor='true' name="shade.gradient.background.color1" description="Shade Gradient Background Color1" type="color" default="rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.25)" value="rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.25)"/> <Variable hideEditor='true' name="shade.gradient.background.color2" description="Shade Gradient Background Color2" type="color" default="rgba(42, 184, 171, 0.5)" value="rgba(42, 184, 171, 0.5)"/> <Variable hideEditor='true' name="shade.gradient.background.color3" description="Shade Gradient Background Color3" type="color" default="rgba(42, 184, 171, 1)" value="rgba(42, 184, 171, 1)"/> <Variable hideEditor='true' name="shade.gradient.background.angle1" description="Shade Gradient Background Angle1" type="string" default="0deg" value="0deg"/> </Group> <Group description="Overlay Monochrome2" selector=""> <Variable hideEditor='true' name="shade2.gradient.background.color1" description="Shade2 Gradient Background Color1" type="color" default="rgba(223, 223, 223, 0.05)" value="rgba(223, 223, 223, 0.05)"/> <Variable hideEditor='true' name="shade2.gradient.background.color2" description="Shade2 Gradient Background Color2" type="color" default="rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.20)" value="rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.20)"/> <Variable hideEditor='true' name="shade2.gradient.background.color3" description="Shade2 Gradient Background Color3" type="color" default="rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.75)" value="rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.75)"/> <Variable hideEditor='true' name="shade2.gradient.background.angle1" description="Shade2 Gradient Background Angle1" type="string" default="15deg" value="15deg"/> </Group>
<!-- b:comment: overlay colored --> <Group description="Overlay Colored" selector="#Label1 .label-item a"> <Variable name="shade3.gradient.background.color1" description="Shade3 Gradient Background Color1" type="color" default="rgba(42, 184, 171, 0.25)" value="rgba(42, 184, 171, 0.25)"/> <Variable name="shade3.gradient.background.color2" description="Shade3 Gradient Background Color2" type="color" default="rgba(42, 184, 171, 0.90)" value="rgba(42, 184, 171, 0.90)"/> <Variable name="shade3.gradient.background.color3" description="Shade3 Gradient Background Color3" type="color" default="rgba(42, 184, 171, 1.00)" value="rgba(42, 184, 171, 1.00)"/> <Variable name="shade3.gradient.background.angle1" description="Shade3 Gradient Background Angle1" type="string" default="45deg" value="45deg"/> </Group> <Group description="Overlay Colored2" selector=".footer-outer"> <Variable name="shade4.gradient.background.color1" description="Shade4 Gradient Background Color1" type="color" default="rgba(255, 255, 255, 1.00)" value="rgba(255, 255, 255, 1.00)"/> <Variable name="shade4.gradient.background.color2" description="Shade4 Gradient Background Color2" type="color" default="rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.90)" value="rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.90)"/> <Variable name="shade4.gradient.background.color3" description="Shade4 Gradient Background Color3" type="color" default="rgba(255, 255, 255, 0)" value="rgba(255, 255, 255, 0)"/> <Variable name="shade4.gradient.background.angle1" description="Shade4 Gradient Background Angle1" type="string" default="45deg" value="45deg"/> </Group>
<!-- b:comment: faded opacity --> <Group description="Faded Opacity" selector="#Blog1 .widget-item-outer .widget-item-slider.has-left::before, #Blog1 .widget-item-outer .widget-item-slider.has-right::after"> <Variable name="shade.faded.background.step1" description="Shade Faded Background Step1" type="string" default="0%" value="0%"/> <Variable name="shade.faded.background.step2" description="Shade Faded Background Step2" type="string" default="50%" value="50%"/> <Variable name="shade.faded.background.step3" description="Shade Faded Background Step3" type="string" default="100%" value="100%"/> <Variable name="shade.faded.background.angle1" description="Shade Faded Background Angle1" type="string" default="270deg" value="270deg"/> <Variable name="shade.faded.background.angle2" description="Shade Faded Background Angle2" type="string" default="90deg" value="90deg"/> <Variable name="shade.faded.background.angle3" description="Shade Faded Background Angle3" type="string" default="180deg" value="180deg"/> </Group>
<!-- b:comment: shadow --> <Group description="Shadow" selector="#blog-hero .hero-item-slider .slider-inner, body .teaser-item"> <Variable name="shadow.color" description="Shadow Color" type="color" default="rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2)" value="rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2)"/> </Group> <Group description="Shadow2" selector="#Blog1 .post-footer .mcmenu .dropdown"> <Variable name="shadow2.color" description="Shadow2 Color" type="color" default="rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4)" value="rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4)"/> </Group> <Group description="Shadow3" selector="header:not([class~='fixed']) #Label1 #more-open"> <Variable name="shadow3.color" description="Shadow3 Color" type="color" default="rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.75)" value="rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.75)"/> </Group>

<Variable hideEditor='true' name="label.cover.TestCase" description="Label Cover TestCase" type="string" default="https://blogger.googleusercontent.com/img/a/AVvXsEijpgj8s-KoBU-qyUwwIWOS2_1eaImVCAt569PyWmB9498O2a21cO3yZkETppwJ8-flwqjpOfxLKhE18aV58ByOzewEv8lIm3qtykx17zKHHiy_R4CSX9sv-nWjzfxqvn12xSL57-SotpuQGvrkOCDAo1hHAqRwmujACHtBuT6aik0DNutwhDNqaK2g-w=w800-h400-c" value="https://blogger.googleusercontent.com/img/a/AVvXsEijpgj8s-KoBU-qyUwwIWOS2_1eaImVCAt569PyWmB9498O2a21cO3yZkETppwJ8-flwqjpOfxLKhE18aV58ByOzewEv8lIm3qtykx17zKHHiy_R4CSX9sv-nWjzfxqvn12xSL57-SotpuQGvrkOCDAo1hHAqRwmujACHtBuT6aik0DNutwhDNqaK2g-w"/>

<Variable hideEditor='true' name="label.cover.Gallery" description="Label Cover Gallery" type="string" default="https://blogger.googleusercontent.com/img/a/AVvXsEj1oLEIBpP8H4IPJr0XsRDY4dYk1ekA_hC9SlcNrtX6Fu0Ynt9vbB-Z3-mklQTM4MzEZUn8wn7lNuaWf14g2SD7RIBMGpUkFMxdhVCOi0uruOHjWIM0-kl3tBHIYSvhdS3zHl1a6z7cyqHBj8QshRbfvgq65fjPw3roAqxT4a1BQsTCBwpTBJ31Y7_jug=w800-h400-c" value="https://blogger.googleusercontent.com/img/a/AVvXsEj1oLEIBpP8H4IPJr0XsRDY4dYk1ekA_hC9SlcNrtX6Fu0Ynt9vbB-Z3-mklQTM4MzEZUn8wn7lNuaWf14g2SD7RIBMGpUkFMxdhVCOi0uruOHjWIM0-kl3tBHIYSvhdS3zHl1a6z7cyqHBj8QshRbfvgq65fjPw3roAqxT4a1BQsTCBwpTBJ31Y7_jug"/> <!-- b:comment: customize blogtemplate - label css (end) -->
<Variable hideEditor='true' name="comments.color" description="Comments Color" type="color" default="#bbbbbb" value="#bbbbbb"/> <!-- b:comment: legacy, use if necessary --> <Variable hideEditor='true' name="post.border.bevel.color" description="Bevel Color post3" type="color" default="#8e7cc3" value="#8e7cc3"/> <Variable hideEditor='true' name="feed.text.color" description="Text Color" type="color" default="#333333" value="#333333"/> <Variable hideEditor='true' name="feed.link.color" description="Link Color" type="color" default="#d52a33" value="#d52a33"/> <Variable hideEditor='true' name="feed.link.visited.color" description="Visited Color" type="color" default="#7d181e" value="#7d181e"/> <Variable hideEditor='true' name="feed.link.hover.color" description="Hover Color" type="color" default="#d52a33" value="#d52a33"/> <Variable name="body.background" description="Body Background" type="background" color="$(body.background.color)" default="$(color) none no-repeat scroll center center" value="$(color) none no-repeat scroll center center"/> <Variable name="separator.outdent" description="Separator Outdent" type="length" default="15px" min="0" max="100px" value="0"/>
*/
/* b:comment: customize blogtemplate - blog css (start) */
.comments .comments-content .icon.blog-author { background-repeat: no-repeat; background-image: url(data:image/png;base64,); }
.comments .comments-content .loadmore a { border-top: 1px solid $(comments.color); border-bottom: 1px solid $(comments.color); }
.comments .continue { border-top: 2px solid $(comments.color); } /* b:comment: legacy, use if necessary */ /* .blog-feeds, .post-feeds { color: $(feed.text.color); }
.blog-feeds a, .post-feeds a { color: $(feed.link.color); }
.blog-feeds a:visited, .post-feeds a:visited { color: $(feed.link.visited.color); }
.blog-feeds a:hover, .post-feeds a:hover { color: $(feed.link.hover.color); }
.inline-ad { border-top: 1px solid $(post.border.bevel.color); margin: 0 -$(separator.outdent); padding: 15px $(separator.outdent); } */
/*---*/
html, body { font: $(body.font); }
body { color: $(body.text.color); background: $(body.background); }
.header-outer { background: $(header.background.color); }
#float-panel-spacer, #header .widget, #header #Label1 .head-item, #mcTooltip.head-item { background: $(header.background.color); }
#Header1 .logo-title { font-family: $(header.logo.font.family); color: $(header.logo.text.color); }
#Header1 .logo-content { font-family: $(header2.logo.font.family); color: $(header2.logo.text.color); }
#Label1 .selected-container { background: linear-gradient(180deg, $(header.selected.background.color) -3.0em, $(header.selected.background.color.transparent) 1.5em, $(header.selected.background.color.transparent) 100%); }
#Label1 .selected-item, #mcTooltip .selected-item { /* b:comment: linear-gradient instead of background to override background-clip */ background-image: linear-gradient(180deg, $(header.selected.background.color), $(header.selected.background.color)) !important; }
#Label1 .selected-item span, #mcTooltip .selected-item span { color: $(header.selected.text.color); }
body #ddmenu .dropdown { box-shadow: 0px 6px 6px $(shadow.color); }
body .link-container { display: flex !important; /* justify-content: space-between; */ flex-direction: row; flex-wrap: wrap; }
body .link-container li { display: inline-block; }
#mcTooltip .link-container li { margin-left: 12px; padding: 6px; }
#mcTooltip .link-container li:first-of-type { margin-left: inherit; }
body .link-container li a > span { display: inline-block; }
#Label1 .link-container { flex-direction: column; }
#Label1 .link-container a { color: inherit; }
#Label1 .link-container li a > span { display: block; text-align: center; }
#Label1 .social-links { flex-direction: row; }
#Label1 .social-links li { flex: 1; }
#Label1 .social-links li a { padding-left: 6px; padding-right: 6px; }
#Label1 .link-item > * { background: linear-gradient($(shade2.gradient.background.angle1), $(shade2.gradient.background.color1), $(shade2.gradient.background.color2), $(shade2.gradient.background.color3)); }
#Label1 .social-links-1 { background: #a7a7a7; }
#Label1 .social-links-2 { background: #1b92db; }
#Label1 .social-links-3 { background: #d52a33; }
body .page-links .link-item .font-icon::before { font-family: "Font Awesome 5 Free"; }
body .social-links .link-item .font-icon::before { font-family: "Font Awesome 5 Brands"; }
body .page-links-1 .font-icon::before { content: "\f02d"; font-weight: 900; }
body .page-links-2 .font-icon::before { content: "\f05a"; font-weight: 900; }
body .social-links-1 .font-icon::before { content: "\f09b"; }
body .social-links-2 .font-icon::before { content: "\f099"; }
body .social-links-3 .font-icon::before { content: "\f0e0"; font-family: "Font Awesome 5 Free" !important; font-weight: 900; }
#Label1 .site-notice > li > div { text-align: center; }
#Label1 .site-notice a { display: inline-block !important; }
body.search-active #BlogSearch1 #search-submit { background: $(light.background.color); }
body.search-active #BlogSearch1 #search-toggle { background: $(button.background.color); color: $(button.text.color); }
.tabs-outer, .main-outer, .footer-outer { padding-top: 12px; padding-bottom: 12px; }
.tabs-outer .widget-item-outer, #blog-hero .hero-item-slider .teaser-meta { background-color: $(hero.widget.background.color); }
#blog-hero .hero-item-slider .teaser-title { /* font-size: 1.25em; */ }
#blog-hero .hero-item-slider .teaser-meta { /* font-size: 0.75em; */ }
#blog-hero .hero-item-slider .teaser-title > * { font-family: $(hero.title.font.family); color: $(hero.title.text.color); }
#blog-hero .hero-item-slider .teaser-meta > * { font-family: $(hero.meta.font.family); color: $(hero.meta.text.color); }
#blog-hero .hero-item-slider .teaser-title, #blog-hero .hero-item-list .teaser-body { background: linear-gradient($(hero.card.background.angle1), $(hero.card.background.color1), $(hero.card.background.color2)); }
#blog-hero .hero-item-slider .teaser-body { background-color: $(shade.solid.background.color); }
#blog-hero .hero-item-slider .slider-inner { box-shadow: 0px 6px 6px $(shadow.color); }
#blog-status-1 { }
#blog-status-1 .status-header > div { background: linear-gradient(0deg, $(hero.background.color1), rgba(0,0,0,0), $(hero.background.color2)); }
#blog-status-1 .status-body .body-item span { font-weight: bold; }
#blog-status-2 .status-footer { background-color: $(shade2.solid.background.color); }
#blog-banner-1 { position: relative; font-size: 1.25em; text-align: center; box-shadow: 0px 6px 6px $(shadow.color); }
#blog-banner-1 .banner-header { padding: 12px; color: $(light.text.color); background: $(dark.background.color); }
#blog-banner-1 .banner-header > .banner-info { position: absolute; right: 12px; color: inherit; width: 1.25em; height: 1.25em; }
#blog-banner-1 .banner-body { padding: 12px; display: block; font-weight: bold; color: $(complementary.text.color); background: linear-gradient(0deg, $(header.background.color), $(complementary.background.color)); }
#blog-banner-1 .banner-body > img { vertical-align: middle; margin-right: 0.5em; }
body.list-view #blog-banner-2 { margin-top: 3em; margin-bottom: 1em; }
body.article-view #blog-banner-2 { display: none; }
body.list-view #blog-banner-2 [id$="_ninja-slider"] { width: 35%; max-width: 250px; }
body.list-view #blog-banner-2 [id$="_ninja-slider"] .caption { background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5); color: #ffffff; }
body .column-left-outer, body .column-right-outer { box-sizing: border-box; padding-left: 12px; padding-right: 12px; }
.main-outer { background-color: $(blog.background.color); padding-top: inherit; }
.main-outer .widget-item-outer, .main-outer .blog-item-outer { background: $(blog.widget.background.color); }
#Blog1 .main-item, #mcTooltip.main-item { font-family: $(blog.section.font.family); color: $(blog.section.text.color); background-color: $(blog.section.background.color); }
#Blog1 .date-header { font-family: $(blog.meta.font.family); color: $(blog.meta.text.color); }
#Blog1 .post-header { }
body.article-view #Blog1 .post-header .post-anchor { background: linear-gradient($(shade.gradient.background.angle1), $(shade.gradient.background.color1), $(shade.gradient.background.color2), $(shade.gradient.background.color3)); }
#Blog1 .post-body { }
#Blog1 .post-body [id$="_ninja-slider"] .caption { background-color: $(shade.solid.background.color); color: $(light.text.color); }
#Blog1 .post-footer { }
#Blog1 .post-footer .mcmenu li.over .top-item { background: $(button.background.color); color: $(button.text.color); }
#Blog1 .post-footer .mcmenu .dropdown { box-shadow: 0px 6px 12px $(shadow2.color); }
#Blog1 .post-footer .mcmenu.mobile .show, #Blog1 .post-footer .mcmenu:not([class~="mobile"]) .clm { background-color: $(shade2.solid.background.color); }
#Blog1 .post-footer .mcmenu .dropdown .clm { padding: 12px; }
body #Blog1 .post-footer .mcmenu.mobile .dropdown .clm { padding: 12px 6px 6px; }
#Blog1 .post-footer .mcmenu .dropdown .clm, #Blog1 .post-footer .mcmenu .dropdown .clm * { font-size: 1rem; }
#Blog1 .widget-item-outer .widget-item-slider.has-left::before { background: linear-gradient($(shade.faded.background.angle1), $(blog2.widget.background.color.transparent) $(shade.faded.background.step1), $(blog2.widget.background.color.transparent) $(shade.faded.background.step2), $(blog2.widget.background.color) $(shade.faded.background.step3)); color: $(light.background.color); }
#Blog1 .widget-item-outer .widget-item-slider.has-right::after { background: linear-gradient($(shade.faded.background.angle2), $(blog2.widget.background.color.transparent) $(shade.faded.background.step1), $(blog2.widget.background.color.transparent) $(shade.faded.background.step2), $(blog2.widget.background.color) $(shade.faded.background.step3)); color: $(light.background.color); }
#blog-panel { background: linear-gradient($(shade.faded.background.angle3), $(pager.background.color.transparent) $(shade.faded.background.step1), $(pager.background.color) $(shade.faded.background.step2), $(pager.background.color) $(shade.faded.background.step3)); }
#blog-panel .nav-item { background-color: $(pager.widget.background.color); }
#blog-pager > span > * { font-family: $(pager.section.number.font.family); font-weight: bold; color: $(pager.section.number.text.color); background-color: $(pager.section.number.background.color); }
#blog-pager span.pager-item-number.gap-left > * { background: linear-gradient($(shade.faded.background.angle1), $(pager.section.number.background.color.transparent) $(shade.faded.background.step1), $(pager.section.number.background.color) $(shade.faded.background.step2), $(pager.section.number.background.color) $(shade.faded.background.step3)); }
#blog-pager span.pager-item-number.gap-right > * { background: linear-gradient($(shade.faded.background.angle2), $(pager.section.number.background.color.transparent) $(shade.faded.background.step1), $(pager.section.number.background.color) $(shade.faded.background.step2), $(pager.section.number.background.color) $(shade.faded.background.step3)); }
#blog-pager span.pager-item a:hover, #blog-pager span.pager-item.selected-item span { color: $(pager.selected.text.color); background-color: $(pager.selected.background.color); }
/* b:comment: data:view.isPreview */ #blog-pager #blog-pager-older-link.selected-item a { color: $(pager.selected.text.color); background-color: $(pager.selected.background.color); }
#blog-pager > span.pager-item-alpha::before { color: $(pager.section.alpha.text.color); background-color: $(pager.section.alpha.background.color); }
#blog-pager > span.pager-item-alpha.disabled-item::before { background-color: inherit; }
#blog-pager > span.pager-item-alpha.disabled-item span { color: inherit; }
.footer-outer { background-color: $(footer.background.color); background-image: linear-gradient($(shade4.gradient.background.angle1), $(shade4.gradient.background.color1), $(shade4.gradient.background.color2), $(shade4.gradient.background.color3)); }
.footer-inner .widget { font-family: $(footer.section.font.family); color: $(footer.section.text.color); background-color: $(footer.section.background.color); border: 12px solid $(footer.widget.background.color); box-sizing: border-box; padding: 12px; margin-bottom: 12px; }
#Attribution1 { color: inherit; }
body .spn-direction-sign { /* color: $(button.background.color.inverse); */ color: $(button.background.color); /* background: $(button.background.color); */ background: $(header.background.color); }
body .spn-freezing-overlay { background-color: $(shade.solid.background.color); }
body #mcTooltip.no-padding, body #mcTooltip, body #mcttCo b { box-shadow: 0px 6px 12px $(shadow2.color); }
body #mcOverlay { background-color: $(shade.solid.background.color); }
body #mcTooltip { padding: 12px; }
#mcTooltip #Subscribe1.widget-item-outer { padding-bottom: inherit; }
#mcTooltip #Label3.widget-item-outer { margin-top: 6px; padding-top: inherit; }
#mcTooltip .subscribe-wrapper .subscribe { width: 100%; background: $(light.background.color); }
#mcTooltip .subscribe-wrapper .subscribe.expanded { box-shadow: 0px 12px 12px -6px $(shadow3.color); }
#mcTooltip .subscribe-wrapper .subscribe-dropdown-arrow { margin-right: 0px; margin-top: 0px; }
body .CSS_LIGHTBOX { z-index: 301; }
body [id$="_ninja-slider"]:not([class~="fullscreen"]) .slider-inner, body [id$="_ninja-slider"].carousel-slider .inner { box-shadow: 6px 6px 12px 0px $(shadow3.color); }
body [id$="_ninja-slider"].carousel-slider.shade-background-color li { background: $(shade.solid.background.color); }
body [id$="_ninja-slider"].carousel-slider.shade-background-color img { opacity: 0.5; }
body [id$="_ninja-slider"] [id$="_thumbnail-slider"] li span { color: $(light.text.color); font-weight: bold; font-size: 1.5em; bottom: 50%; left: 50%; transform: translate(-50%, 50%); }
/*---*/
.widget-container { box-sizing: border-box; padding: 12px; }
.widget { box-sizing: border-box; }
.widget-item-outer, .blog-item-outer { box-sizing: border-box; padding: 12px; }
.blog-item-inner, .widget-item-inner { box-sizing: border-box; }
.blog-item-inner { padding: 12px; }
.widget-item-inner { padding: 12px; }
.widget-title { font-family: $(widget.font.family); color: $(widget.text.color); /* b:comment: widget-title variation */ line-height: 2em; font-size: 1em; }
.header-inner .widget-title, .tabs-inner .widget-title { display: none; }
.main-inner .widget-title, .footer-inner .widget-title, #mcTooltip .widget-title { font-weight: bold; }
#mcTooltip .widget-title { padding: 6px; }

.section-container { box-sizing: border-box; padding: 6px; }

#Blog1 .post-inner .section-item:last-of-type { margin-bottom: inherit; }

body .teaser-container .title-item a { color: inherit; }

body .title-item, #Blog1 .post-header .title-item { font-weight: bold; }
body.list-view #Blog1 .post-header .title-item.full-cover, body.list-view #Blog1 .post-header .title-item.small-cover { color: $(light.text.color); text-shadow: 2px 2px $(dark.text.color); padding: 6px; box-sizing: border-box; }

body.article-view #Blog1 .post-header .cover-item.dark-text-color ~ .title-item { color: $(dark.text.color); }
body.article-view #Blog1 .post-header .cover-item.transparent-text-color ~ .title-item { color: transparent; }
#Blog1 .post-header .title-item a { color: inherit; }

#Blog1 .post-body .content-item { color: inherit; font: inherit; }
body.list-view #Blog1 .post-header .title-item ~ .content-item { margin-top: 12px; }
body.article-view #Blog1 .post-body .content-item { margin-top: 12px; }
body.list-view #Blog1 .post-body .cover-item.small-cover ~ .content-item { color: $(light.text.color); background-color: $(shade.solid.background.color); padding: 6px 6px 2em 6px; box-sizing: border-box; height: 0px; transition: all 0.4s ease-in-out; cursor: pointer; }
body.list-view #Blog1 .post-body .cover-item.small-cover ~ .content-item::before { font-family: "Font Awesome 5 Free"; font-weight: 900; font-size: 1.5em; cursor: pointer; padding-left: 6px; padding-right: 12px; }
body.list-view #Blog1 .post-body .cover-item.small-cover ~ .content-item:not([class~="over"])::before { content: "\f102"; }
body.list-view #Blog1 .post-body .cover-item.small-cover ~ .content-item.over::before { content: "\f103"; }

body .label-item { /* b:comment: set background-size to 0px to hide label cover */ background-size: 0px 0px; }

#Label1 .label-item, #Label1 #more-open { font-family: $(header.section.font.family); color: $(header.section.text.color); }

body .header-item, #mcTooltip .header-item { padding: 6px; box-sizing: border-box; text-overflow: ellipsis; white-space: nowrap; overflow: hidden; }
body .body-item { /* font-family: $(section.body.font.family); */ }
body .body-item, #mcTooltip .body-item { padding: 6px; box-sizing: border-box; }
body .footer-item, #mcTooltip .footer-item { padding: 6px; box-sizing: border-box; margin-top: 6px; }
body .teaser-header:not([class~="none-cover"]), body.list-view .cover-item:not([class~="none-cover"]) { background: $(cover.background.color); }
body .teaser-header img, body .teaser-header a.ns-img, body.list-view .cover-item img, #PopularPosts1 a > * { transition: all 0.4s; }
body .teaser-header img, body .teaser-header a.ns-img, body.list-view .cover-item img, #PopularPosts1 .teaser-header { opacity: 0.5; }
body .teaser-header a.ns-img { background-size: cover; background-position: 50% 50%; }

.button-item { cursor: pointer; }
body .button-item.is-link { color: $(button.text.color); background: $(button.background.color); }

body .teaser-footer.button-item a { color: $(label.text.color); }

body .font-icon { display: inline-block; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; text-rendering: auto; -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased; }
span > span.font-icon + span { margin-left: 0.5em; }
#Blog1 .date-outer .font-icon, #Blog1 .mcmenu .top-item .font-icon, #Blog1 .mcmenu .back.show .font-icon, #Blog1 .post-body .jump-link .font-icon { width: 2em; line-height: 2em; text-align: center; vertical-align: middle; font-size: 1.25em; }

#mcTooltip .subscribe .font-icon, #mcTooltip .subscribe .font-icon + span { display: inline-block; line-height: 1.25em; vertical-align: middle; }

body a:visited { color: $(link.visited.color); }
body a:hover { color: $(link.hover.color); } */

body .teaser-item { box-shadow: 0px 6px 6px $(shadow.color); }
body .teaser-body { background: $(blog.card.background.color); }
body .teaser-footer { font-family: $(blog.card.font.family); color: $(blog.card.background.color); background: $(blog.card.background.color); }
body .teaser-footer::after { border-top-color: transparent; border-right-color: transparent; border-bottom-color: transparent; border-left-color: inherit; }

body .light-background-color { background: $(light.background.color) !important; }
body .dark-text-color { color: $(dark.text.color) !important; }
body .dark-background-color { background: $(dark.background.color) !important; }

@media (hover: hover) {
#Label1 nav ul > li[tabindex]:hover > span, #Label1 nav ul > li[tabindex]:hover > i { color: $(header.selected.text.color); }
}
/*---*/
@media only screen and (min-width: 480px) {
html, body { font-size: $(body.font.desktop.size); }
#header button, #header input, #header form, #header nav, #header #header-inner { /* b:comment: ios textinput zoom fix */ font-size: 1rem; }
header button i.fas, header .menu-icon.font-icon { font-size: 1.5em; }
header:not([class~="fixed"]) #Label1 nav ul li.label-item { padding: 6px; }
body:not([class~="more-active"]) header:not([class~="fixed"]) #Label1 nav ul li.label-item { background-image: none; }
body.more-active header:not([class~="fixed"]) #Label1 nav ul li.label-item a { box-shadow: 0px 6px 18px -6px $(shadow3.color); }
body:not([class~="more-active"]) header:not([class~="fixed"]) #Label1 nav ul li.label-item a::before, body:not([class~="more-active"]) header:not([class~="fixed"]) #Label1 nav ul li.label-item a::after { content: ""; width: 0px; height: 0px; border-style: solid; position: absolute; color: $(header.background.color); left: 50%; transform: translateX(-50%); border-right-color: transparent; border-left-color: transparent; }
body:not([class~="more-active"]) header:not([class~="fixed"]) #Label1 nav ul li.label-item a span::before, body:not([class~="more-active"]) header:not([class~="fixed"]) #Label1 nav ul li.label-item a span::after { content: ""; width: 0px; height: 0px; border-style: solid; position: absolute; color: $(header.background.color); top: 50%; transform: translateY(-50%); border-top-color: transparent; border-bottom-color: transparent; }
header #Label1 nav ul li > a, header #Label1 nav ul li > span { font-size: 1.25em; }
header:not([class~="fixed"]) #Label1 nav ul li > a { font-size: 1.5em; }
header:not([class~="fixed"]) #Label1 nav > ul > li[tabindex] .caret { transform: scale(1.25); }
body:not([class~="more-active"]) header:not([class~="fixed"]) #Label1 nav > ul > li[tabindex] { box-shadow: 0px 12px 12px -6px $(shadow3.color); border-radius: 1.5em; margin-bottom: 24px; }
body:not([class~="more-active"]) header:not([class~="fixed"]) #Label1 nav > ul > li.selected-container[tabindex] { background: linear-gradient(0deg, $(header.selected.background.color) -3.0em, $(header.selected.background.color.transparent) 1.5em, $(header.selected.background.color.transparent) 100%); }
body.more-active header:not([class~="fixed"]) #Label1 nav > ul > li.selected-container[tabindex] { background: none; }
header.fixed #Label1 nav > ul > li[tabindex].over .dropdown::after { border-top-color: $(header.background.color); border-bottom-color: transparent; border-left-color: $(header.background.color); border-right-color: $(header.background.color); background-color: $(shade2.solid.background.color); }
header:not([class~="fixed"]) #header #Label1 .head-item.dd-inner { background-color: inherit; }
header.fixed #Label1 nav > ul > li[tabindex] .column { background-color: $(shade2.solid.background.color); padding: 12px; min-width: 200px; }
.tabs-outer { background: linear-gradient($(hero.background.angle1), $(hero.background.color1) 0%, $(hero.background.color2) 100%); min-height: 1em; }
.tabs.widget-container { padding: 12px 0px; }
body.list-view #crosscol-overflow.tabs.widget-container { padding-top: inherit; }
.tabs-outer .hero-item-slider { padding: 0px; }
#blog-status-1 .body-item { padding: 24px; font-size: 1.75em; }
#blog-status-2 .body-item { padding: 24px; font-size: 1.5em; }
body.article-view #Blog1 .post-header .title-item { font-size: 2.0em; }
body.article-view #Blog1 .post-header .cover-item.large-text-size ~ .title-item { font-size: 3.0em; }
body.article-view #Blog1 .post-header .cover-item.small-text-size ~ .title-item { font-size: 1.5em; }
body.list-view #Blog1 .post-header .title-item { font-size: 1.75em; }
body #Blog1 .post-footer .mcmenu ul .post-labels .dropdown .clm { min-width: 16em; }
body #Blog1 .post-footer .mcmenu .byline-body.section-container { padding: 6px 6px 0px 0px; }

#Blog1 .post-footer .mcmenu:not([id=mcmenu0]) .byline-body > .section-item { display: inline-block; white-space: nowrap; }
#Blog1 .post-footer .mcmenu:not([id=mcmenu0]) .byline-body > .section-item:not(:empty) { margin-left: 6px; margin-bottom: 6px; }
#Blog1 .widget-item-outer .widget-item-slider.has-left::before, #Blog1 .widget-item-outer .widget-item-slider.has-right::after { font-size: 2.5em; width: 1.5em; }

.mcTooltipInner { padding: 12px; }
body [id$="_ninja-slider"].carousel-slider [id$="_thumbnail-slider"] li span { font-size: 3em; white-space: pre-wrap; box-sizing: border-box; padding: 12px; }

body.list-view:not([class~="index-type"]) .tabs-outer { background: linear-gradient($(hero.background.angle1), $(hero.background.color1) 0%, $(hero.background.color2) 100%); }

/* b:comment: customize blogtemplate - blog css (end) */
.widget-item-control { display: none; }
header button { border: inherit; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; background-color: transparent; }
header form { margin: 0px; padding: 0px; }
header input, #mcTooltip input { border-radius: inherit; border: inherit; margin: 0px; padding: 0px; }
#mcTooltip input[type=submit] { /* b:comment: ios safari style fix */ -webkit-appearance:none; }
#mcTooltip textarea { border: 0px; display: block; border-radius: 0; }
header input, #mcTooltip input, #mcTooltip textarea { font: inherit; }
#PageList2 ul, #Label2 ul, #mcTooltip ul, .widget-content ul.teaser-container { margin: 0px; padding: 0px; }
#PageList2 ul, #Label2 ul { list-style-position: inside; }
.subscribe-wrapper ul { list-style-type: none; }
figure { margin: 0px; }
img + figcaption { text-align: center; max-width: 100%; }
.separator.content-block[style*="center"] [imageanchor] img + figcaption[style] { margin: auto; }
.separator.content-block[style*="left"] img + figcaption[style] { margin-left: 0px; margin-right: auto; }
.separator.content-block[style*="right"] img + figcaption[style] { margin-left: auto; margin-right: 0px; }
#Blog1 .post-body hr.separator.content-block { padding: 1px; height: 1px; background: linear-gradient(90deg, transparent, $(dark.background.color), transparent); border: 0px; position: relative; overflow: visible; opacity: 0.75; }
#Blog1 .post-body hr.separator.content-block::before { content: ""; height: 20px; width: 20px; background: $(blog.section.background.color); position: absolute; top: 50%; left: 50%; transform: translate(-50%, -50%); }
#Blog1 .post-body hr.separator.content-block::after { content: ""; height: 8px; width: 8px; background: $(pager.selected.background.color); position: absolute; top: 50%; left: 50%; transform: translate(-50%, -50%); }
/*---*/
html { height: 100%; }
body { margin: inherit; }
body.menu-active { overflow-y: hidden; }
/*---*/

body.sidebar-left .column-center-outer, body.sidebar-left .column-left-outer, body.sidebar-left .column-right-outer { float: right; }
#blog-sidebar .sidebar { position: relative; }
#sidebar-left-1.no-items, #sidebar-right-1.no-items { display: none; }

body.search-active #BlogSearch1 { width: 100%; /* b:comment: ios safari render fix */ transition: width 0.4s ease-in-out; }
#BlogSearch1 #BlogSearch1_form, #BlogSearch1 #search-form { position: relative; }
body.search-active #BlogSearch1 #search-form { width: calc(100% - 3em); }

body.search-active #BlogSearch1 #search-input { padding: 0px 1em; box-sizing: border-box; }
body:not([class~="search-active"]) #BlogSearch1 #search-input { width: 0px; }
/*---*/
#Label1 nav li { line-height: 3rem; }
#Label1 nav ul li.label-item { background-size: cover; background-repeat: no-repeat; background-clip: content-box; background-position: center; }
#Label1 nav ul li.label-item:hover { background-image: initial; }

#Label1 nav ul li a { display: block !important; }

#mbtrecent .label-container, #mbtrelated .label-container { text-overflow: ellipsis; white-space: nowrap; overflow: hidden; /* b:comment: label-container variation */ /* top: 125px; */ /* transform: translateY(-100%); */ }
#mbtrecent .widget-item-list .title-item, #mbtrelated .widget-item-list .title-item, #mbtrecent .widget-item-list .meta-container, #mbtrelated .widget-item-list .meta-container, #mbtrecent .widget-item-list .content-item, #mbtrelated .widget-item-list .content-item { height: 3em; display: block; line-height: 1.5em; overflow: hidden; }
#mbtrecent .widget-item-list .meta-container, #mbtrelated .widget-item-list .meta-container { height: auto; }
#mbtrecent .teaser-footer, #mbtrelated .teaser-footer { position: relative; top: 0px; width: calc(100% - 3em); margin-top: 12px; margin-left: 0.5em; }
#mbtrecent .teaser-footer::after, #mbtrelated .teaser-footer::after { content: ""; width: 0px; height: 0px; border-style: solid; border-width: 1.5em 0 1.5em 2em; position: absolute; right: -2em; top: 0px; }
#mbtrecent .teaser-footer a, #mbtrelated .teaser-footer a { display: block; width: 100%; height: 3em; line-height: 3em; white-space: nowrap; text-overflow: ellipsis; overflow: hidden; text-align: center; }

#Blog1 .widget-item-outer .widget-content { position: relative; }
#Blog1 .widget-item-outer .teaser-container { display: inherit; }
#Blog1 .widget-item-outer .widget-item-slider { white-space: nowrap; user-select: none; -ms-user-select: none; -moz-user-select: none; overflow-x: auto; overflow-y: hidden; -ms-overflow-style: none; cursor: move; cursor: grab; }
#Blog1 .widget-item-outer .widget-item-slider.active { cursor: grabbing; }
#Blog1 .widget-item-outer .teaser-header a { cursor: inherit; }

#Blog1 .widget-item-outer .widget-item-slider.has-left::before, #Blog1 .widget-item-outer .widget-item-slider.has-right::after { font-family: "Font Awesome 5 Free"; font-weight: 900; z-index: 1; display: block; position: absolute; top: 0px; bottom: 0px; display: flex; align-items: center; justify-content: center; }
#Blog1 .widget-item-outer #mbtrecent.widget-item-slider.has-left:before, #Blog1 .widget-item-outer #mbtrecent.widget-item-slider.has-right:after { top: 12px; }
#Blog1 .widget-item-outer .widget-item-slider.has-left::before { content: "\f053"; /* b:comment: ios safari render fix */ /* left: 0px; */ left: -1px; }
#Blog1 .widget-item-outer .widget-item-slider.has-right::after { content: "\f054"; /* b:comment: ios safari render fix */ /* right: 0px; */ right: -1px; }

body.article-view #Blog1 .post-header .cover-item.full-cover ~ .post-anchor { /* opacity: 1.0; */ }

body.article-view #Blog1 .post-header .separator.cover-item:not([class~="none-cover"]) > *, body.article-view #Blog1 .post-body .separator.content-block.full-width > *, body.article-view #Blog1 .post-body .separator.content-block.small-width > * { clear: inherit !important; float: inherit !important; }

/*---*/
#blog-panel { position: fixed; bottom: 0px; right: 0px; left: 0px; transition: max-height 0.4s ease-in-out; animation: slide-bottom 0.7s; }

#blog-pager > .pager-item-alpha::before { position: absolute; pointer-events: none; z-index: 1; }

#blog-pager > .pager-newer::before { left: 0px; font-family: "Font Awesome 5 Free"; font-weight: 900; content: "\f053"; }

#mbtrecent > div, #mbtrelated .widget-item-list > li { width: 250px; }
#Blog1 .post-body hr.content-block { width: 75%; }
#Blog1 .post-body .content-block { overflow-x: auto; }
#Blog1 .post-body .content-block.separator [imageanchor] { padding-left: 0px !important; padding-right: 0px !important; float: inherit !important; }
#blog-panel .nav-container { padding: 0.5em; }
#history, #backtop, #blog-pager { min-height: 2em; }
body.article-view #backtop { position: absolute; right: 0.5em; top: 0.5em; }
body.list-view #backtop, body.list-view #history { display: none !important; }
body.article-view #history { position: absolute; right: 0.5em; bottom: 0.5em; }
body #blog-pager { width: calc(100% - 2.5em); margin: 0px 0.5em 0px 0px; }
body.list-view #blog-pager { width: 100%; margin: 0px; font-size: 1.25em; }
body.article-view #blog-pager { flex-direction: column; }
body #blog-pager > span { margin: 0px 2px; }
body.article-view #blog-pager .pager-newer, body.article-view #blog-pager .pager-older { margin: 0px; }
body.article-view #blog-pager #blog-pager-newer-link ~ #blog-pager-older-link { margin-top: 0.5em; }
#history > span, #backtop > span, #blog-pager > span, #blog-pager > .pager-item-alpha::before { height: 2em; line-height: 2em; min-width: 2em; }
body #blog-pager > .pager-newer > * { padding-left: 3em; }
body #blog-pager > .pager-older > * { padding-right: 3em; }
body.index-type #blog-pager > .pager-item-alpha > *, body.label-type #blog-pager > .pager-item-alpha > * { padding: inherit; color: transparent; }
body.index-type #blog-pager > .pager-item-alpha > *:hover, body.label-type #blog-pager > .pager-item-alpha > *:hover { color: transparent; }
body.index-type #blog-pager > .pager-item-alpha, body.label-type #blog-pager > .pager-item-alpha { /* flex-grow: 1; */ flex-basis: 2em; }
body.item-type #blog-pager > .pager-item-alpha { flex-basis: inherit; }
#FeaturedPost1 { width: 100%; margin-bottom: 12px; }
#FeaturedPost1 .post-summary > a { position: relative; }
#FeaturedPost1 .post-summary > a > .teaser-body { position: absolute; left: 33%; right: 0px; height: 100%; overflow: hidden; }
#FeaturedPost1 .post-summary > a > .teaser-header { width: 33%; }
#PopularPosts1 { width: 100%; position: relative; }
#PopularPosts1 .item-content > a { position: relative; }
#PopularPosts1 .item-content > a > img { width: 33%; }
#PopularPosts1 .item-content > a > .teaser-body { position: absolute; left: 33%; right: 0px; height: 100%; }
#PageList2 { width: 100%; }
#Label2 { width: 100%; }
#PageList2, #Label2, #Attribution1 { padding-left: 24px; padding-right: 24px; box-sizing: border-box; }
}
/*---*/
@media only screen and (min-width: 480px) and (max-width: 1023px) {
body .teaser-container .label-container .label-item:not(:nth-child(1)) { display: none; }
body .teaser-container .label-container .label-item:not(:only-of-type)::after { content: "\002026"; }
}
/*---*/
@media only screen and (min-width: 480px) and (max-width: 1023px) {
#blog-hero #mbtslider1_ninja-slider { width: calc(100% * 2/3 - 48px); }
#mbtslider1_ninja-slider ul { padding-top: calc(100% * 3 / 4) !important; }
#mbtslider1_ninja-slider li > div, #mbtslider1_ninja-slider .teaser-header, #mbtslider1_ninja-slider .teaser-header a { height: 100%; }
#mbtslider1_ninja-slider .teaser-header a { padding-top: inherit; width: 100%; margin-left: 0px; height: calc(100% - 3em); }
#blog-hero #mbtrandom { width: calc(100% / 3 + 36px); }
#mbtrandom li:nth-of-type(4) { display: block; }
body.item-type #blog-pager > .pager-item-alpha { flex-basis: calc(50% - 3em) }
/* b:comment: override position in dependence of FeaturedPost presence variation */ #PopularPosts1 { width: 100%; }
/* b:comment: override position in dependence of FeaturedPost presence variation */ #FeaturedPost1 + #PopularPosts1 { height: 100%; position: absolute; right: 0px; width: calc(100% / 3 * 2 - 12px); }
}

<b:template-skin> <b:variable default='1223px' name='content.width' type='length' value='1223px'/> <b:variable default='0px' name='main.column.left.width' type='length' value='103px'/> <b:variable default='400px' name='main.column.right.width' type='length' value='400px'/>
<![CDATA[
#layout .content-outer, #layout .content-fauxcolumn-outer, #layout .region-inner { margin: auto; }
@media only screen and (min-width: 1024px) {
body.sidebar-left .footer-inner, body.sidebar-right .footer-inner { width: calc(100% * 2/3 + 12px); margin: 0px; }
}
@media only screen and (min-width: 1240px) {
.region-inner, .footer-fauxborder-left { margin: auto; width: $(content.width); }
body.full-width .region-inner, body.full-width .footer-fauxborder-left { width: 100%; }
#mcTooltipWrapper { max-width: $(content.width); }
body.full-width #mcTooltipWrapper { max-width: 100%; }
body #blog-sidebar.fixed { width: $(main.column.right.width); }
body.sidebar-left #blog-sidebar.fixed { left: inherit; }
body.sidebar-right #blog-sidebar.fixed { right: inherit; transform: translateX($(content.width)) translateX(-100%); }
body.sidebar-right.full-width #blog-sidebar.fixed { right: 0px; transform: inherit; }
body.sidebar-left .column-center-outer, body.sidebar-right .column-center-outer { width: calc(100% - $(main.column.right.width)); }
body #blog-sidebar:not([class~="fixed"]) .column-left-outer, body #blog-sidebar:not([class~="fixed"]) .column-right-outer { width: $(main.column.right.width); }
body.sidebar-left .footer-inner, body.sidebar-right .footer-inner { width: calc(100% - $(main.column.right.width) + 12px); margin: 0px; }
}
/*---*/
@media only screen and (min-width: 1549px) {
.region-inner, .footer-fauxborder-left { width: calc($(content.width) + 3 * $(main.column.left.width)); }
#mcTooltipWrapper { max-width: calc($(content.width) + 3 * $(main.column.left.width)); }
body.sidebar-right #blog-sidebar.fixed { transform: translateX($(content.width)) translateX(-100%) translateX($(main.column.left.width)) translateX($(main.column.left.width)) translateX($(main.column.left.width)); }
body #blog-sidebar.fixed { width: calc($(main.column.right.width) + $(main.column.left.width)); }
body.sidebar-left .column-center-outer, body.sidebar-right .column-center-outer { width: calc(100% - $(main.column.right.width) - $(main.column.left.width)); }
body #blog-sidebar:not([class~="fixed"]) .column-left-outer, body #blog-sidebar:not([class~="fixed"]) .column-right-outer { width: calc($(main.column.right.width) + $(main.column.left.width)); }
body.sidebar-left .footer-inner, body.sidebar-right .footer-inner { width: calc(100% - $(main.column.right.width) + 12px - $(main.column.left.width)); }
}
]]> </b:template-skin>

function menuToggleMobile(e) { var target = e.target; var headerOuterElm = document.getElementsByTagName('header')[0].firstElementChild;

if (moreElm && burgerElm) { moreElm.style.zIndex = 1;

entry.title: Showcase – Markup, Gallery and Hero-Header
entry.content:
Blog template capabilities

To change overall blog appearance Blogger allows its users to choose from various provided blog themes or import custom made blog templates like Gelati Sugarfree

Blogger provides a WYSIWYG blog post-editor which enables its users to express multiple markup elements like headings, paragraph, image, list, quote and video. This blog template expands that feature set with beginner friedly CSS-triggered generation of hero-image variations and Javascript-configurable gallery and carousel components, powered by third-party integrations from menucool.com

Let's start with some Headings

H3 Heading

H4 Heading

The paragraph is the default markup type. It should not have any alignment of any kind. It should just flow like you would normally expect. Nothing fancy. Just straight up text, free flowing, with love.

This paragraph is left aligned.

This italic paragraph is centered.

This paragraph is right aligned.
This paragraph is colorful, with a orange background and blue text. Colored content should have a high enough contrast, so that the text is readable.

This paragraph prefers Jazz over Justin Timberlake. It also uses the small font size.

This paragraph has something important to say: It has a large font size, which defaults to 36px. 

The huge text size defaults to 46px, but the size can be customized. 

Neither of these paragraphs care about politics, but this one is bold, medium sized and has a drop cap.
Ordered list
  1. Orderd List Item 1
  2. Orderd List Item 2
  3. Orderd List Item 3
  4. Orderd List Item 4
Unordered list
  • Unorderd List 👀 1
  • Unorderd List 👽 2
  • Unorderd List 👻 3
  • Unorderd List 👍 4


  • 1.) Even before the internet was a thing, people already used Filler Text as a filler in printing tests.
  • 2.) Even before the internet was a thing, people already used Filler Text as a filler in printing tests.
  • 4.) Even before the internet was a thing, people already used Filler Text as a filler in printing tests.
  • 5.) Even before the internet was a thing, people already used Filler Text as a filler in printing tests.
  • 6.) Even before the internet was a thing, people already used Filler Text as a filler in printing tests.
  • 7.) Even before the internet was a thing, people already used Filler Text as a filler in printing tests.
  • 8.) Even before the internet was a thing, people already used Filler Text as a filler in printing tests.
  • 1
  • 2
  • 4
  • 5
  • 6
  • 7
  • 8
  • Supports Youtube, Vimeo and HTML video/audio
  • This video starts from 0:10


Video components have settings for showing and hiding the playback controls. Use autoplay and playback controls responsibly.

Quote

The Verse block

A block for haiku?
Why not?
Blocks for all the things!

entry.title: Showcase – Extensive Markup, Image Handling and Hero-Image
entry.content:
Blog post styling

Tacit is a general purpose CSS framework. A customized version is provided along with this blog template, specifically configured to address only blog post-related CSS rules to prevent unintended interactions with blog's overall layout.

You should not use any CSS classes to make your HTML code look nice. Just make sure it is HTML5 compliant and you'll be fine. Again, no classes, just standard HTML elements, like <table> and <input>. Check the source code of this page. 


  /* b:comment: customize blogtemplate - blogpost css (start) */
  body.article-view .post-body .content-item input,body.article-view .post-body .content-item textarea,body.article-view .post-body .content-item select,…
  /* b:comment: customize blogtemplate - blogpost css (end) */
]]></b:skin>
<b:template-skin>

By the way, Tacit is compliant with W3C validator requirements: HTML and CSS.

Forms

Here is a simple form with <fieldset>:

This is a one-line form without <fieldset>:

Tables

A simple table would look like this:

Make Price Year
BMW X6 $75,000 2013
Mercedes-Benz E350 $52,700 2014

Headings

Just use standard <h1>...<h6> tags:

This is <h1>

Use a heading of the highest level once per page.

This is <h2>

Use <h2> for sections of the page.

This is <h3>

Use <h3> for sub-sections.

This is <h4>

I would recommend to avoid this type of heading at all.

This is <h5>

I would recommend to avoid this type of heading at all.

This is <h6>

I would recommend to avoid this type of heading at all.

Sup® and Sub® Elements

Lists

Just use standard <ul>, <ol> and <dl> tags:

  • Orange
  • Apple
    1. First
    2. Second
      • Blue
      • Yellow
      • Green
      • Red
    3. Third
  • Apricot
Banana
A yellow fruit that is easy to peel.
Which also grows on a tree.
Cashew
A tan nut without a peel.
Cherry
A red fruit that is hard to peel.

Blockquote

Use this to emphasize a quote
— Author Name, Publication

Aside

Use this to emphasize a content related to the main content.

main content

Keyboard

Sometimes you want to let people know they should press a keyboard command like ctrl + l.

Media

It's recommended to add .content-block css-class to image, video and embedded elements to acquire a better responsive behavior.

To scale images, append an additional css-class to provide aligned and floating images a coherent layout, including mobile views.



As an alternative use Blogger's standard sizinig method, e.g. img-attribute. Hint: Blogger adapts image width and alignment for mobile requests.

link.title: Showcase – Extensive Markup, Image Handling and Hero-Image

entry.title: Image Handling – Basic Usage
entry.content:
This is a paragraph. It should not have any alignment of any kind. It should just flow like you would normally expect. Nothing fancy. Just straight up text, free flowing, with love. Completely neutral and not picking a side or sitting on the fence.

Lists are an interesting beast

It's a corner case to make sure that:
  • Floating elements align and space correct next to bullet items
  • Lists within lists do not break the ordered list numbering order
  • Your list styles go deep enough

Ordered - Unordered - Ordered

  1. ordered item
  2. ordered item
    • unordered
    • unordered
      1. ordered item
      2. ordered item
  3. ordered item
  4. ordered item

Ordered - Unordered - Unordered

  1. ordered item
  2. ordered item
    • unordered
    • unordered
      • unordered item
      • unordered item
  3. ordered item
  4. ordered item

Now to compose a text Lorem Ipsum is much more fun!

With the online text generator you can process your personal Lorem Ipsum enriching it with html elements that define its structure, with the possibility to insert external links, but not only.

Be original, test your imagination... our Lorem Ipsum generator will amaze you. Try it now!

In fact, inserting any fantasy text or a famous text, be it a poem, a speech, a literary passage, a song's text, etc., our text generator will provide the random extraction of terms and steps to compose your own exclusive Lorem Ipsum.

Unordered - Ordered - Unordered

  • unordered item
  • unordered item
    1. ordered
    2. ordered
      • unordered item
      • unordered item
  • unordered item
  • unordered item

Unordered - Unordered - Ordered

  • unordered item
  • unordered item
    • unordered
